fields.Title: Workshops on Volcanoes
fields.Description/Abstract:
This is a proposal under development to host an international series of research field workshops at active volcanoes.  The first will hopefully occur in January 2012 at Volcan Santiaguito (Guatemala) and will be organized by Boise State University.  Fifty participants are invited to attend.

Description of Partner:  Each partner will be involved in bringing instrumentation to volcano and/or presenting their research in the form of lectures and hands-on tutorials.
Role:  Principal
